headline: Lopez: If he ever gets his job back, I have just the hat for Jimmy Kimmel, thanks to Trump
When Trump announced changes to the H-1B visa program Friday, it was the middle of the night in India. For some H-1B holders there, the next day and a half was a chaotic race around the world.
China said it will no longer seek new special treatment for developing countries at the WTO, signaling a possible effort to ease a friction point with the U.S.
